remediation: Upgrade micropython/micropython to version 1.22.0 or higher.
title: Heap-based Buffer Overflow

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow via the slice_indices function. An attacker can potentially execute arbitrary code or disrupt service by manipulating the input to this function.
